commands.raised.value.hud.query: HUD offset is currently set to: %d
commands.raised.value.hud.set: HUD offset is now set to: %d
commands.raised.value.chat.query: Chat offset is currently set to: %d
commands.raised.value.chat.set: Chat offset is now set to: %d
commands.raised.toggle.support.query: Extended mod support is currently set to: %d
commands.raised.toggle.support.set: Extended mod support is now set to: %d
commands.raised.toggle.sync.query: HUD/Chat sync is currently set to: %d
commands.raised.toggle.sync.set: HUD/Chat sync is now set to: %d
options.raised.title: Raised Options
options.raised.hud.tooltip:
Controls the HUD offset.
Maximum slider value is a quarter of scaled screen height.
options.raised.chat.tooltip:
Controls the chat offset.
Maximum slider value is a quarter of scaled screen height.
options.raised.support.tooltip:
Enables extended mod support.
Adds support for mod elements not associated with vanilla HUD elements.
options.raised.sync.tooltip:
Enables HUD/chat sync.
Synchronizes the chat offset to the HUD offset.
